title: Textile, 1995-50-229, ca. 1780
medium:
Linen warp, cotton weft, plain weave.
block-printed
dimensions:
Warp: 113.5cm (44 5/8in.)
Weft: 94.5cm cm (37 1/4in.)
Height of repeat: 31 cm (12 in.)
(edges cut but must almost have been full width)
description: Curving stripes and flowers in the field. Two shades of red.
